DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether quantitative motor-sparing quadriceps muscle follow adductor canal nerve block versus femoral nerve block . Patients randomly place one three treatment group : 1 ) Femoral nerve block , 2 ) Adductor canal nerve block - low volume , 3 ) Adductor canal nerve block - high volume . Quadriceps function assess operating room use skin patch electrical stimulation . Follow visit patient continue course 2 day patient 's stay hospital . A total 60 patient enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: Total Knee Arthroplasty Utilizing Adductor Canal Block : Effect Quadriceps Sparing
DOC.criteria: All patient undergo primary unilateral total knee arthroplasty Planned use combine spinal epidural ( CSE ) anesthesia Ability follow study protocol Contraindication spinal epidural anesthetic Chronic opioid use ( defined daily almost daily use opioids > 3 month ) Allergy local anesthetic Preexisting neuropathy weakness operative limb Any neuromuscular disorder Diabetes type I II Contraindication femoral nerve block adductor canal nerve block Allergy intolerance study medication BMI > 35 kg/m2
